name: emi.wms
description: The Workload Management System (WMS) comprises a set of Grid middleware components responsible for the distribution and management
releaseNotes:
Enabled Argus-based access control using the glite-CE/WN profile

Integration with the EMI Service Registry

Removed provision of WMProxy Java API (glite-wms-wmproxy-api-java) and WMProxy Python API (glite-wms-wmproxy-api-python)
